results.name: Exponential Riordan array [x*exp(x),x].
comment: This is the triangle of denominators from Leibniz's harmonic triangle, A003506, augmented with a main diagonal of 0's.

Note, the usual definition of the exponential Riordan array [f(x), x*g(x)] associated with a pair of power series f(x) and g(x) requires f(0) to be nonzero. Here we don't make this assumption. - _Peter Bala_, Feb 13 2017
formula: The exponential Riordan array [x*exp(x),x] factors as [x,x]*[exp(x),x] = A132440*A007318.

This array is the infinitesimal generator for A116071; that is, Exp(A216973) = A116071, where Exp denotes the matrix exponential. A signed version of the array is the infinitesimal generator for A215652.
The first column of the array Exp(t*A216973) is the sequence of idempotent polynomials, the row polynomials of A059297.
